wait_for_active_shards.description: Sets the number of shard copies that must be active before proceeding with the delete operation. Defaults to 1, meaning the primary shard only. Set to `all` for all shard copies, otherwise set to any non-negative value less than or equal to the total number of copies for the shard (number of replicas + 1)

refresh.description: If `true` then refresh the effected shards to make this operation visible to search, if `wait_for` then wait for a refresh to make this operation visible to search, if `false` (the default) then do nothing with refreshes.

if_seq_no.description: only perform the delete operation if the last operation that has changed the document has the specified sequence number

if_primary_term.description: only perform the delete operation if the last operation that has changed the document has the specified primary term

version.description: Explicit version number for concurrency control
